text:
i'm trying to get an attachment in here. Someone told me it supports them, but
it's not on the Enter Bug screen, so i'll commit this and see where it takes me.
creator: stephan@wanderinghorse.net

text:
Created attachment 1415
added -emacs and emacsmode='...' support to <record> tasks
creator: stephan@wanderinghorse.net
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Nightly build 2002-04-13 comes with a record task that supports emacs mode.

As I don't think that this setting should affect all loggers just because I've
changed the value in a single record task, I've made the patch a lot less
intrusive by not fiddling with project at all.
